description: This file defines a React component 'ChatPanel' which provides a chat interface with message display and input handling, interacting with a backend API for chat responses.

methods.name: ChatPanel
methods.description: React functional component implementing a chat interface with message state, input handling, and API interaction.

methods.name: onSend
methods.description: Handles sending user input to chat API and updating message state with response.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles Enter key press to trigger message send, unless Shift is held.
